title: Muslim Congress leaders meet Karnataka CM Basavaraj Bommai amid loudspeaker row - Deccan Herald
content:
1. Muslim Congress leaders meet Karnataka CM Basavaraj Bommai amid loudspeaker row  Deccan Herald
  2. Hanuman Chalisa Vs Azaan Row Now In Karnataka, Loudspeakers Blare Chalisa To Counter Azaan  India Today
  3. Azaan vs Hanuman Chalisa: Karnataka govt to act in a restrained way  Daijiworld.com
  4. Loudspeaker Row Grips Karnataka: SRS Workers Play Early Morning Bhajans at Temples to Counter Azaan  Republic World
  5. 'Failure of government': DK Shivakumar urges Karnataka CM to ensure peace amid loudspeaker row  India Today
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: A delegation of Muslim lawmakers from the Congress urged Chief Minister Basavaraj Bommai to ensure peace and harmony in the state at a time when the right-wing groups launched a campaign against the use of loudspeakers at mosques on Monday. Deputy Leader of the Opposition U T Khader, Rajya Sabha member Syed Naseer Hussain, Shantinagar MLA N A Haris and MLC Naseer Ahmed held talks with Bommai where they said the issue of noise pollution should not be linked to any particular religion.Â
